data.title: Alcatel-Lucent USA Definition
data.meta_description: Define Alcatel-Lucent USA. means Alcatel-Lucent USA, Inc., a Delaware corporation.
data.text:
MASTER SERVICES AGREEMENT SCHEDULE N – REAL ESTATE LICENSE EXHIBIT B License Fee Licensee shall pay a fee of ***** plus all applicable taxes and fees to Licensor at the following address: Alcatel-Lucent USA Inc.

Debtor Jurisdiction Type of filing found Secured Party Collateral Original File Date File Number Alcatel-Lucent USA Inc.

Room 9-1s456 000000 Xxxxx Xxxxx Xxxxxxx Xxxxxxxxxx, XX 00000 With copy to: General Counsel, Americas Region (as of MSA Effective Date, Xxxxx Xxxxxx) Alcatel-Lucent USA Inc.

All notices, requests, demands and other communications shall be in writing and shall be deemed given if personally delivered, sent by facsimile with confirmation, or mailed, express or certified mail, return receipt requested, or by nationally recognized overnight courier service, to the following addresses: If to Licensor: Alcatel-Lucent USA Inc.

Any notice or demand which, under the terms of this MSA or under any statute, must or may be given or made by Service Provider or ALU, shall be in writing and shall be given or made by confirmed facsimile, or similar communication or by certified or registered mail addressed to the respective Parties as follows: To ALU: Legal Notices: Vice-President, Contract Management (as of the MSA Effective Date, Xxxxxx Xxxxxxx) Alcatel-Lucent USA Inc.

DE – SOS UCC-1 Société Générale, New York Branch Receivables 6/30/2010 2010 2285629 Alcatel-Lucent USA Inc.

CONFIDENTIAL TREATMENT REQUESTED Agreement Number 4000000000 This Project Agreement, (hereinafter “PA”) is entered into by and between Alcatel-Lucent USA Inc., having a place of business at 600-000 Xxxxxxxx Xxxxxx, Xxxxxx Xxxx, NJ 07974 USA (“Alcatel-Lucent”), and Gxxxxxx Networks Inc., having a place of business at USA (“Subcontractor”).

DE – SOS UCC-1 Xerox Corporation Equipment 5/31/2012 2012 2086728 Alcatel-Lucent USA Inc.

U.S.A. - US 100.00 % Alcatel-Lucent Deutschland AG Alcatel-Lucent Internetworking Deutschland Gmbh Germany - DE 100.00 % Alcatel-Lucent USA Inc.
